item.description:
Organizer:Scott
Contact: See his profile
Target Audience: All photographers


I'm setting up a casual afternoon at my studio in Salem. Bring a camera with a PC connection or a hot shoe, I have everything else.

For this first shoot we will be using the people there for portrait shooting. If you would like to volunteer please note it in your RSVP. Our next shoot at the Studio we can discuss hiring a professional model(s).
item.name: Studio shoot in Salem, MA
